responses.rationale: The segment discusses concern among experts, not economic data or metrics.
The segment reports the detection of an outbreak and case confirmation, not economic data or metrics.
The segment reports concerns and the discovery of cases, not economic data or metrics.
The segment includes explicit low-risk framing ('risks currently being low'), which is not neutral reporting.
Reports numerical metrics ('Over half of the over 900 human H5N1 cases... have resulted in death') using standard verbs.
The segment lists symptoms, not economic data or metrics.
